main event: Two civilian men observed a reddish-yellow light flying in a straight course near San Rafael, California on July 25, 1952.
interesting points: The object was disc-shaped and bright white in color., It was estimated to be traveling at 150 M.P.H. at an altitude between 10,000 and 20,000 ft., Observers noted it might have been an astronomical light., The sighting lasted for approximately one and one-half hours., The Weather Officer reported scattered clouds at 10,000 ft. during the sighting.
witness description: S/Sgt. George G. Owens (USAF retired) and Sgt. Nicholas Martucci
